title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 197.1 - Balance sheet accounts, purpose of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 197.1 - Balance sheet accounts, purpose of

State Regulations

By balance sheet accounts are meant those titles under
which the ledger accounts are combined and summarized to show, as of a given
date, the assets, liabilities, contributions from the municipality, and surplus
or deficit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
197.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
